description: This survey aims to gather opinions and knowledge about climate change.
name: Climate Change Survey

questions.questionText: Climate change is a global phenomenon characterized by long-term shifts in temperature patterns, weather events, and ecosystems, primarily caused by human activities such as burning fossil fuels, deforestation, and industrial emissions. It poses significant challenges to the environment, biodiversity, and human societies, requiring urgent collective action to mitigate its impacts and promote sustainable practices for a better future.
Which of the following factors contribute to climate change? (Select all that apply)
Do you believe that climate change is primarily caused by human activities?
Which of the following renewable energy sources do you think should be prioritized for reducing carbon emissions? (Select all that apply)
Have you personally witnessed any climate change-related effects in your region? (Select all that apply)
How concerned are you about the potential impacts of climate change?
Do you think governments should prioritize climate change mitigation efforts over other issues?
Which of the following measures do you believe can have a significant impact in combating climate change? (Select all that apply)
Do you believe that individuals can make a difference in addressing climate change?
Are you willing to change your lifestyle to reduce your carbon footprint?
Which of the following climate change adaptation strategies do you consider important? (Select all that apply)
